translation.en: -[horse whinnies] -[man 3] Watch where you're sodding going!
My name is Enola Holmes. You may remember me.
translation.ko: 저는 에놀라 홈즈라고 해요 절 기억하는 분도 계시겠죠

translation.en: Open and ready for my first clients.
translation.ko: 첫 고객을 맞을 준비를 마치고 영업을 시작했어요

translation.en: I was going to join the pantheon of great Victorian detectives.
translation.ko: 빅토리아 시대의 위대한 탐정 계보를 이으려고요 "위대한 탐정 클럽 1827년 창설"

translation.en: -[Enola] And the infamous Reginald Swain. -[Swain growls]
And best of all, I would be joining my brother.
translation.ko: 그리고 무엇보다도 제 오빠의 존재가 중요하죠

translation.en: A detective in my own right,
translation.ko: 드디어 저도 제 힘으로 탐정이 돼서
- 몇 살이라고? - 이런, 아가씨는 너무 어린데?

translation.en: -Stone the crows, you're young. -[Enola] My age is an advantage.
translation.ko: - 몇 살이라고? - 이런, 아가씨는 너무 어린데? 젊어서 유리한 점이 많아요

translation.en: I can go to places others can't, explore where others won't.
translation.ko: 남들이 못 가는 곳도 갈 수 있고 남들이 꺼리는 곳도 살필 수 있죠

translation.en: And I can fight. I know jujitsu.
-The Tewkesbury case? -Well, that was Sherlock Holmes.
translation.ko: - 튜크스베리 사건? - 셜록 홈즈가 해결한 거잖소

translation.en: -Sherlock Holmes, wasn't it? -I assure you, it was mine.
translation.ko: 셜록 홈즈 사건이잖아, 안 그래? 장담하건대 제 사건이었어요

translation.en: Good man, that Tewkesbury. Brave lad.
translation.ko: 좋은 청년이죠 튜크스베리 군은 용감한 사내예요

translation.en: Read all about it! Read all about it!
Sherlock Holmes and the case of the Brixton corpse.
translation.ko: 셜록 홈즈가 해결하는 브릭스턴 시체 사건입니다

translation.en: While I had not a single case, Sherlock has been drowning in them.
translation.ko: 사건 의뢰 하나 없는 나와 달리 셜록 오빠에겐 의뢰가 넘쳐 나네요

translation.en: Though his latest appears to be vexing him.
translation.ko: 다만 요새 맡은 사건 때문에 폭발 직전인가 봐요

translation.en: My mother, meanwhile, is still on the run.
translation.ko: "수배 중 유도리아 홈즈" 한편 엄마는 아직 도주하는 신세고…

translation.en: And trying not to draw attention to herself.
[chuckles] Though that's never been her forte.
translation.ko: 그런 쪽으로는 늘 취약하시지만요 "여성의 평등권을 보장하라"

translation.en: [Enola] Yes, and then there is… him.
translation.ko: 네, 물론 다른 사람 소식도 있죠 "연례 무도회에 초대합니다" 그 녀석요

translation.en: [Tewkesbury] My lords, reform is not a task to be accomplished,
translation.ko: "와줄래? 튜크스베리" 상원 여러분, 개혁은 완수해야 하는 과제도 아니고

translation.en: nor a bill that can be passed.
Rather it is a constant need for change.
translation.ko: 다만 변화를 위해 끊임없이 필요한 것입니다

translation.en: [Enola] Lord Tewkesbury, the champion of change and progress.
translation.ko: 튜크스베리 경은 변화와 진보를 이끄는 선봉자이며

translation.en: A man to approach with the noblest cause.
[Enola] But I had no time for distractions.
translation.ko: 하지만 제겐 정신 빼앗길 여유가 없어요

translation.en: And besides, he's still a nincompoop.
translation.ko: 게다가 이 녀석은 여전히 얼간이란 말이죠

translation.en: [Eudoria] Too many people make it their sole purpose in life
translation.ko: 너무나 많은 사람들이 주변 세상에 맞추어 사는 걸

translation.en: to fit into the world around them.
But no matter how lost you feel,
translation.ko: 하지만 아무리 길을 잃은 것 같아도

translation.en: if you stay true to yourself,
the path will always find you again.
[Enola] But my path, it seemed, had come to an end.
translation.ko: 하지만 저의 길은 끝장난 것 같았어요

translation.en: All I could do now was go home.
I've come to the right place then.
translation.ko: 그럼 제가 잘 찾아온 게 맞네요

translation.en: Is it true you find lost people?
Where did you get this? It's months old.
translation.ko: 이게 어디서 났어요? 몇 달 지난 건데

translation.en: I found it on the street.
Everyone says she's run away, but Sarah wouldn't do that,
translation.ko: 다들 도망갔다고 하지만 세라가 그럴 리 없어요 "티푸스, 걸리면 죽습니다"

translation.en: The other girls are still at work.
We're lucky. Most girls here are five to a room.
translation.ko: 저희는 운이 좋아요 대부분 5명이 한방을 쓰거든요

translation.en: Oh. Sarah likes to leave cheese out for 'em.
What does she look like, Sarah?
We weren't sisters in the usual way.
She looks like she'll blow over in the wind.
translation.ko: 비쩍 말라서 바람 불면 날아가게 생겼네

translation.en: [Enola] So, Bessie, what was Sarah wearing the day she disappeared?
translation.ko: 베시, 실종되던 날 세라는 어떤 옷을 입고 있었죠?

translation.en: It was her other dress, the green one.
translation.ko: 그거 말고 녹색 드레스를 입고 있었어요

translation.en: Sarah said you had to learn about the world if you're gonna live in it.
translation.ko: 이 세상을 살아가려면 세상에 대해 배워야 한다고 했어요 "청소년을 위한 과학책"

translation.en: [Bessie] Nah. But there's plenty have taken an interest.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 하지만 언니에게 관심 있는 남자는 많았어요

translation.en: She weren't much of a gardener.
Look, how about you quit sniffing round?
[Bessie] Quiet, Mae! Just let her do her job.
The 12th of March. Does that date mean anything to you?
We don't need help from people like you.
translation.ko: 당신 같은 사람의 도움은 필요 없어요

translation.en: I found her, so she's staying.
-[Mae] Bloody girls poking their nose in. -[Enola chuckles]
-And she didn't leave a note? -Just this.
translation.ko: - 메모 남긴 건 없어요? - 이것만 두고 갔어요

translation.en: She worked two jobs, you see. We couldn't get by without it.
translation.ko: 언니는 두 군데서 일했거든요 안 그러면 먹고살기 어려워서요

translation.en: Some place called The Stag Antlers.
Oh. No, it's all right. We'll figure that out later.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 괜찮아요 그런 부분은 나중에 얘기해요

translation.en: So tell me, when was the last time you saw her?
translation.ko: 그럼 언니를 마지막으로 본 게 언제죠?

translation.en: A week ago, at the match factory.
She had a fight with Mr. Crouch, the foreman, in his office.
translation.ko: 현장 감독인 크라우치 씨와 사무실에서 다투고 있었어요

translation.en: The match factory, is that where she works?
translation.ko: 그 성냥 공장이 세라의 직장인 거죠?

translation.en: Where we all work. We're match girls, ain't we?
translation.ko: 우리 모두의 직장이죠 다 성냥 공장에서 일하니까요

translation.en: -Then that's where we'll start. -So you'll take it? You'll take the case?
translation.ko: 그럼 거기서부터 시작하죠 그럼 이 사건을 맡아 주시겠다는 말씀이죠?

translation.en: I shall find you, Sarah Chapman.
Red hair, green dress, makeup, science books, 12th March.
translation.ko: 빨간 머리, 녹색 드레스 화장품, 과학책 3월 12일

translation.en: [Bessie] Stay with me. Follow my way.
-[Enola] How many girls work here? -[Bessie] Five hundred, maybe six.
translation.ko: 여기 여성 노동자가 몇 명이나 돼요? 500명? 600명쯤 될지도요

translation.en: -Is my neckerchief all right? -Oh, well, it's around your neck.
translation.ko: - 목에 두른 스카프도 괜찮아요? - 잘 걸려 있어요

translation.en: -[girl] Please, Mr. Crouch. -[Crouch] I said, out.
translation.ko: - 안 돼요, 크라우치 씨 - 나가라고 했어!

translation.en: [Crouch] Oi, new girl. Name in the register.
Don't worry, you get used to the smell.
Put the matches on the comb…
That is a penny off your wages.
[Bessie] She's just learning the way, Mr. Crouch.
translation.ko: 아직 배우는 중이라 그래요 크라우치 씨

translation.en: [Crouch] She better learn quicker, or it's a penny off yours too.
translation.ko: 빨리 배우는 게 좋을 거야 너도 1페니 까기 전에

translation.en: Anyone else want a money dock?
translation.ko: 또 품삯 깎이고 싶은 사람 있나?

translation.en: I need to get up into that office.
[Eudoria] All it takes is one small thing
to change the rules of the world.
How did that bloody happen, eh?
Oi, pick 'em up. Pick 'em up, pick 'em up.
Don't you look at me like that, girl.
[man] Charles! This is not what I was expecting when we made our arrangement.
-My pockets are empty. -You think mine full?
translation.ko: - 내 주머니는 텅 비었소 - 그건 나도 마찬가지요

translation.en: You gave me your word you'd find whoever was doing this to us.
translation.ko: 경께서 우리에게 이런 짓을 한 범인을 찾아내겠다고 약속했잖소

translation.en: You sound almost threatening, Mr. Lyon.
This is not what I expected when we began our arrangement.
translation.ko: 아무튼 이건 우리가 계약을 맺을 때와는 다릅니다

translation.en: And now theft, on top of everything else.
translation.ko: 그것도 모자라 이제 절도 사건까지 생기다니

translation.en: -You heard the man. Get this dealt with. -[Mr. Lyon] Come along, William.
translation.ko: - 잘 들었지? 이 문제 처리해 - 가자, 윌리엄

translation.en: [woman] Sir, do you have any suspicions as to who this perpetrator might be?
[Charles] Would I be asking you if I did?
But, sir, perhaps if we were to consider whether this theft is connected.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 이번 절도 사건과 연관이 있을 수 있으니

translation.en: -I have ideas-- -Did I ask for your advice?
translation.ko: - 제 생각에… - 내가 자네 의견을 물어봤나?

translation.en: Or did I simply tell you to get it done?
I'll make sure the right people know, sir.
Our ladies are working at the highest level of production and efficiency.
translation.ko: 보시다시피 직원들은 최고 수준의 생산성과 효율성을 갖췄습니다

translation.en: -[Mr. Lyon] Please, if you will… -[foreboding music plays]
Doris, how are you? How's your sister? Is she, um, still unwell?
translation.ko: 도리스, 잘 지내는가? 자네 언니는 아직도 아픈가?

translation.en: Really is the plague of our time.
Two years it's been killing these girls.
translation.ko: 2년 동안 수많은 여성 노동자들의 목숨을 앗아갔어요

translation.en: Well, Lord McIntyre, if I might suggest a little lunch. I think we've earned it.
translation.ko: 자, 매킨타이어 경 저희와 점심이라도 같이 드시죠 고생하셨잖습니까

translation.en: [Enola] How did Sarah do it? Get into the office?
translation.ko: 세라는 어떻게 그 사무실에 들어간 거죠?

translation.en: There was a fire at one of the stations. Foreman got distracted.
translation.ko: 작업대 한 군데서 불이 났어요 그래서 현장 감독이 경황이 없었죠

translation.en: You're a good detective, Enola Holmes.
translation.ko: 에놀라 홈즈 아가씨는 정말 뛰어난 탐정이시네요

translation.en: [Enola] Everyone thinks detecting is a profession littered with rules,
translation.ko: 흔히 사람들은 탐정 일이 규칙투성이인 줄 알지만

translation.en: but in truth, there's only one.
Pull on every loose thread you find.
translation.ko: 엉성한 실마리가 보이면 전부 잡아당겨 보렴

translation.en: -What a pleasant evening. -Young lady, I'm afraid I'm married.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 아름다운 밤이죠? 아가씨, 유감이지만 난 유부남이오

translation.en: That's tuppence for a sweet, cheating face like yours.
-Genuine toffee. -[man] Out of my way, girl.
♪ Where did you get that hat? Where did you get that tile? ♪
♪ Isn't it a nobby one And just the proper style? ♪
♪ I should like to have one Just the same as that ♪
♪ Where'er I go, they shout "Hello, where did you get that hat?" ♪
translation.ko: 어딜 가나 사람들이 묻지 '안녕, 그 모자 어디서 샀어?'

translation.en: ♪ Where'er I go, they shout "Hello, where did you get that hat?" ♪
translation.ko: 어딜 가나 사람들이 묻지 '안녕, 그 모자 어디서 샀어?'

translation.en: ♪ Where did you get that hat? Where did you get that tile? ♪
♪ Isn't it a nobby one And just the proper style? ♪
♪ I should like to have one Just the same as that ♪
♪ Where'er I go, they shout "Hello, where did you get that hat?" ♪
translation.ko: 어딜 가나 사람들이 묻지 '안녕, 그 모자 어디서 샀어?'

translation.en: [announcer] And now, all the way from Shanghai,
translation.ko: 자, 이제 머나먼 상하이에서 오신 리 씨가 선보이는

translation.en: Mr. Li and his world of illusions!
translation.ko: 자, 이제 머나먼 상하이에서 오신 리 씨가 선보이는 환상의 세계로 여러분을 안내합니다!

translation.en: You the foozler who took my pan stick?
translation.ko: 네가 내 파운데이션 스틱 훔쳐 간 녀석이지?

translation.en: Um, no. I'm looking for a girl called M--
She worked two jobs, you see.
Some place called The Stag Antlers.
You got five seconds to tell me why you're here.
translation.ko: 5초 줄 테니까 여기 온 이유를 말해

translation.en: She did, didn't she? And Bessie doesn't know.
There's plenty Bessie don't know. And plenty you don't need to tell her.
translation.ko: 걔는 모르는 게 많아 네가 전하지 말아야 할 것도 많지

translation.en: I know you helped her into that office. She took those pages. Why?
translation.ko: 당신 도움으로 사무실에 들어갔잖아요 세라가 왜 명부를 찢어 간 거죠?

translation.en: -What's happened to her? -Just leave us be, all right?
translation.ko: - 세라는 어떻게 된 거예요? - 우리를 그냥 내버려 둬

translation.en: Posh girls like you don't belong in this fight.
translation.ko: 너 같은 상류층 아가씨는 이런 싸움이랑 안 어울려

translation.en: Posh or not, one thing I am good at is fighting.
translation.ko: 상류층이든 뭐든 간에 내가 싸움 하나는 끝내주거든

translation.en: Now tell me, where is she hiding and what does she know?
translation.ko: 이제 세라가 아는 게 뭔지 지금 어디 숨어 있는지 말해

translation.en: You got more to you than I thought.
[clears throat] Whatever this is, Mae is on stage in 30 ticks,
translation.ko: 왜들 이러는지 모르겠지만 메이는 30초 후에 출연 예정인데

translation.en: and she's still dressed as a gent.
translation.ko: 아직도 이렇게 신사복을 입고 있으면 안 되지

translation.en: So let go of her, now.
-Get her out of here. -[man] Be my pleasure.
Where did Sarah Chapman do her makeup?
[man] Full of secrets that one, and not a bad actress.
translation.ko: 걘 비밀이 많은 애였지만 나쁜 배우는 아니었어

translation.en: I'd have given her the boot if she weren't so good,
but she did attract the men with big pockets.
translation.ko: 그 애한테는 돈 많은 남자를 유혹하는 재주가 있었거든

translation.en: There was this one gent, society type, and he came regular.
translation.ko: 사교계에 드나들 것 같은 신사 하나가 여기 단골이었어

translation.en: Very keen on him she was. He'd send flowers, letters.
translation.ko: 걔가 그 남자를 참 좋아했어 남자는 꽃도 보내고 편지도 보냈지

translation.en: [chuckles] You see, they all think there's hope. That love is coming their way.
translation.ko: 그런 여자들은 희망을 품지 자기에게 사랑이 찾아올 거라고

translation.en: Blokes like that, they want cheap,
"As we two ate of the fruit of love…"
translation.ko: '둘이서 여덟 가지 사랑의 열매를 먹을 때'

translation.en: "A bell did ring in the sky above"
translation.ko: '하늘 높은 곳에서 울려 퍼지는 벨 소리'

translation.en: "So wander that place With its blossoms white"
translation.ko: '하얀 꽃이 가득 핀 곳 가든 플레이스를 거닐고'

translation.en: "A chapel awaits us out of sight"
translation.ko: '보이지 않는 그곳에서 작은 예배당이 우릴 기다리네'

translation.en: Did she run away with this fellow?
Or is she running from him?
I hope it's the latter. His poetry is extremely bad.
What are you doing here? It's not safe.
-Yes, let me know when you meet one. -[Sherlock sighs drunkenly]
translation.ko: 그래, 혹시 그런 놈 보이면 알려 줘
- 오빠, 멀쩡한 거 맞아? - 난 괜찮아

translation.en: It was just a disagreement over a glass of wine
translation.ko: 그냥 와인 한잔하다가 의견 충돌이 생긴 거야

translation.en: I find after wine, it's very difficult to make your arms and legs move.
translation.ko: 와인을 마시고 나면 팔다리가 제대로 안 움직이더라

translation.en: I don't usually imbibe, but I'm on a case, you see.
translation.ko: 평소엔 안 마시지만 요즘 사건 수사 중이거든
- 그게 여간 까다로운 게 아니야 - 여기요!

translation.en: -[Sherlock] Where are we going? -221 Baker Street.
[Enola] As it turns out, my brother is medievally heavy.
translation.ko: 알고 보니 우리 오빠가 꽤 중후한 체중의 소유자네요

translation.en: It's like carrying a dead horse on which sits another dead horse.
translation.ko: 죽은 말을 실은 또 다른 죽은 말을 들어 옮기는 느낌이에요

translation.en: I didn't know you had steps.
One should always have steps to avoid people stepping on you.
translation.ko: 밟히기 싫으면 밟고 올라갈 계단 있는 집에 살아야지

translation.en: That's a tip. You should probably write that down.
translation.ko: 중요한 거니까 받아 적어두는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: [sighs] All right. Lift your right leg.
Better leg, the left. You should write that down.
translation.ko: 다리는 왼쪽이 더 낫지 꼭 받아 적어

translation.en: -Oh, but it's such a mess. -It's perfect. Don't touch anything.
translation.ko: - 난장판이 따로 없네 - 완벽해 아무것도 건드리지 마

translation.en: [Sherlock] None of your business. I work alone. It's private.
translation.ko: 알려고 하지 마 난 혼자 일해, 비밀이라고

translation.en: One should never be interrupted when thinking.
translation.ko: 생각할 땐 절대 방해하면 안 돼

translation.en: And why, pray, have you moved everything?
translation.ko: 도대체 왜 이게 다 뒤죽박죽된 거지?

translation.en: -Nothing looks different to me. -Nothing looks different? Ev--
translation.ko: - 하나도 안 바뀌었는데? - 하나도 안 바뀌었다? 전부…

translation.en: Your head is sore? I can't think why.
[Sherlock] This is why I don't have people in my rooms.
translation.ko: 이래서 내 방에 사람을 안 들이는 거야

translation.en: Look what you've done. My papers are entirely out of order.
translation.ko: 네가 한 짓을 좀 봐 서류가 뒤죽박죽 엉망이 됐잖아

translation.en: Seems to be an awful lot of question marks on that map of yours.
-I will see you again. -Is that why you're drinking?
translation.ko: - 또 보자 - 그래서 술 마시는 거야?

translation.en: I'm more than certain… [sniffs] …it's not so old.
-Maybe I can help. -You can help by leaving.
translation.ko: - 내가 도와줄게 - 가는 게 날 도와주는 거야

translation.en: Huh. Yes. The world will be a much safer place
if we don't see the inside of Sherlock Holmes, only the out.
translation.ko: 셜록 홈즈의 내면을 보지 않고 겉모습만 보는 게 더 평화롭겠지

translation.en: Have you ever considered a flatmate?
-For what purpose? -To stop you descending into this.
translation.ko: - 무슨 목적으로? - 이 꼴로 살지 말라고!

translation.en: how those seeking advice so often like to dispense it.
translation.ko: 조언을 구해야 할 사람들이 되레 조언하는 경우가 종종 있더라

translation.en: Did I ask for advice? I found you on the street, drunk.
translation.ko: 내가 무슨 조언을 구해? - 술 취한 오빠를 도와준 게 난데? - 너에 대한 관찰 내용을 알려 줘?

translation.en: -Now what may I observe about you? -We're not playing this game.
translation.ko: - 술 취한 오빠를 도와준 게 난데? - 너에 대한 관찰 내용을 알려 줘? - 관찰 놀이는 사양할게 - 신발이 지저분하고

translation.en: Shoes a state. Hair's not much better.
-You and Mycroft are so similar. -You need to wash your clothes.
translation.ko: - 머리 꼴도 엉망이야 - 마이크로프트 오빠랑 똑같네 - 옷 좀 빨아 입어 - 결국 오빠도
그만해! 손톱은 왜 또 그 모양이지?

translation.en: -Why are you working in a match factory? -What?
translation.ko: - 왜 성냥 공장에서 일하는 건데? - 뭐?

translation.en: Last night, they were dirty with green traces. This morning, they are black.
translation.ko: 어젯밤엔 묵은 때가 초록색이더니 오늘 아침엔 검은색이잖아

translation.en: The phosphorous from the match-making has mixed with oxygen.
translation.ko: 성냥 만드는 데 쓰는 인이 산소를 만나 그렇게 변한 거지

translation.en: I wasn't in such a state as to not see that.
translation.ko: 그것도 눈치 못 챌 만큼 엉망인 상태는 아니었어

translation.en: -How did you-- -[Sherlock] And your neck is red.
translation.ko: - 아니, 어떻게… - 더구나 목이 빨간 걸 보니

translation.en: Someone has gripped it or held a knife against…
translation.ko: 멱살을 잡히거나 칼로 위협당한 거 같은데…

translation.en: Are you involved in something dangerous?
If you need my help, my offer remains on the table.
translation.ko: 내 도움이 필요한 거라면 기꺼이 도와줄게

translation.en: Don't be so desperate to prove yourself, Enola.
translation.ko: 자신을 증명하겠다고 너무 절박하게 애쓰지 마, 에놀라

translation.en: I am not desperate, and I don't need your or anyone's help.
translation.ko: 난 절박하지도 않고 오빠나 다른 누구의 도움도 필요 없어

translation.en: [Enola] How dare he? How dare he lecture me?
When he can't even solve his own case
translation.ko: 자기 사건도 해결 못 하는 주제에

translation.en: and he lives in a bed of flummoxing papers and bewildering mold.
translation.ko: 엉망진창 서류 더미랑 곰팡이 소굴에서 동거하는 주제에

translation.en: How dare he claim I'm desperate? It is not true.
I'm on a case. Undercover. Forget I told you that piece of information.
translation.ko: 사건 때문에 위장 근무 중이야 아니, 방금은 못 들은 걸로 해

translation.en: It's the strangest thing. I could have sworn I've seen you here before.
translation.ko: 정말 신기하다, 내가… 전에도 분명히 여기서 널 본 거 같거든

translation.en: Well, this is my… My route through to the Lords.
translation.ko: 그래, 난 이 길을 따라 상원에 출석해

translation.en: Well, I… I breakfast here on occasion.
I mean, yes, it's a lovely place. I-I know the gardener here.
translation.ko: 맞아, 여기 참… 멋지지? 여기 정원사랑 아는 사이야

translation.en: We've been discussing what to sow for next year's crop.
translation.ko: 내년엔 뭘 심는 게 좋을지 의논했는데

translation.en: Uh, Sweet Williams, for their lovely vivid reds.

translation.ko: 네 근황은 다 챙겨 보고 있어

translation.en: You are quite the eligible bachelor.
Starting my own business. A perpetual challenge.

translation.ko: 아마 넌 이해 못 할 거야

translation.en: -Well, Enola, if you need help-- -I do not.
translation.ko: - 에놀라, 내가 도울 일이 있으면… - 아니, 됐어

translation.en: Should my problem become horticultural, I shall seek you out.
translation.ko: 원예 쪽으로 문제가 생기면 너한테 연락할게

translation.en: Well, you know where to find me
translation.ko: 그럼 내가 어디 있을지 알 테니까…

translation.en: I hope you enjoy your breakfast.
[in normal voice] Oh. Good, he isn't.
I don't come here every day.
Just on days when I feel a need.
And sometimes he doesn't take this path. Sometimes he takes the parallel one.
translation.ko: 더구나 쟤가 이 길로 매번 오는 건 아니에요 나란히 놓인 다른 길로도 가죠

translation.en: -[sighs] -[echoing] You know where to find me.
"The chapel awaits us With its blossoms white"
translation.ko: '작은 예배당이 우릴 기다리네' '하얀 꽃이 가득 핀 곳'

translation.en: "As we two ate of the fruit of love"
translation.ko: '둘이서 여덟 가지 사랑의 열매를 먹을 때'

translation.en: "A bell did ring in the sky above"
translation.ko: '하늘 높은 곳에서 울려 퍼지는 벨 소리'

translation.en: The game has found its feet again.
There is a certain satisfaction that you feel as a detective
translation.ko: 사건 해결의 기미가 보이고 결말에 다가갈수록

translation.en: when your case comes closer to resolution.
…which I don't do, or teaching a dog to sit.
translation.ko: 저야 안 하지만요 혹은 개 훈련과도 비슷해요

translation.en: You begin to glow with the acknowledgement of a job well done.
translation.ko: "파블로프 박사의 강아지 조련기" 성공적으로 마친 일이 인정받으며 빛을 발하기 시작하죠

translation.en: [boy] There's a new Holmes in town.
That's right. Sherlock Holmes has met his match.
My name will be known, and Bessie will have a sister once again.
translation.ko: "에놀라 홈즈 위대한 탐정 탄생!" 제 이름이 널리 알려지고 베시는 다시 언니를 만날 거예요

translation.en: And that is a job well…
What happened? Who did this to you?
-Was it him, Sarah's man? Mae! -[tense music continues]
I'll fetch a doctor for you.
Oh, no, no, no. I'm investigating a case. A disappearance of a girl.
translation.ko: 제가 아니에요 조사 중인 사건이 있는데 한 여자분 실종 사건이에요

translation.en: -What, that girl? -No. No, no, no. H-Her name is Mae.
translation.ko: - 저 여자요? - 아뇨 아니에요, 이분은 메이라고

translation.en: She worked at the Paragon Theater, the matchstick factory.
translation.ko: 파라곤 극장이랑 성냥 공장에서 일하는 노동자예요

translation.en: I was sent to investigate a possible disturbance.
translation.ko: 사건 신고 제보를 받고 수사를 나왔습니다

translation.en: Someone heard some screams, and then I discovered this young lady.
translation.ko: 비명을 들었다는 사람이 있어서 와 보니 이 아가씨가 있었습니다

translation.en: Uh, his sister. A detective too.
Shouldn't you be in finishing school?
translation.ko: 왜 여자 기숙 학교에 안 있고?
실종 사건을 조사 중이랍니다 실종자 이름이…

translation.en: Sarah Chapman? Well, well, how intriguing. So am I.
translation.ko: 세라 채프먼? 거참 흥미롭군, 나도 마찬가지거든
- 절도와 협박 혐의로 수배 중이오 - 협박요?

translation.en: -When were the screams heard, inspector? -Ten past the hour, sir.
Uh, no, I was trying to suppress the blood. I-I was trying to save her.
translation.ko: 아니에요, 전 이분을 살리려고 출혈 부위를 압박한 거예요

translation.en: Or trying to get information out of her.
translation.ko: 정보를 캐내려고 압박한 걸 수도 있잖소

translation.en: Oh, I couldn't. I can't pat her down, sir.
translation.ko: 안 되죠, 아가씨한테 손댈 수는 없지 않습니까

translation.en: Come along, Lestrade. Let's not be coy about this.
translation.ko: 어서 진행하시오, 레스트레이드 내숭 떨지 말고

translation.en: -She's a detective. She knows the rules. -[Lestrade] Yes.
translation.ko: 이 아가씨도 탐정이니까 - 규칙을 잘 알 거 아니오 - 네

translation.en: Then why are you hiding it?
Found at a murder scene with a freshly dead corpse,
translation.ko: 갓 살해당한 시체가 있는 범죄 현장에서

translation.en: harboring evidence isn't gonna look good.
translation.ko: 증거물을 은닉하는 건 여간 수상한 행동이 아니오
내가 못 믿을 게 뭐요! 젊은 아가씨?

translation.en: That young ladies don't have the hands for killing?
translation.ko: 어린 여자는 살인을 저지를 리 없다는 건가?

translation.en: -Go on! -[Grail] After her, all of ya!
Why ever would she ever do that?
-[policeman] Get out of the way! Move! -[woman shrieks]
Ah. Lestrade of Scotland Yard. You remember me, I hope.
We're looking for your sister. She's caused a bit of trouble.
translation.ko: 여동생분을 찾고 있습니다 문제를 좀 일으켜서요

translation.en: That I do not have two of.
Perhaps you can explain what you believe Enola has done.
translation.ko: 에놀라가 무슨 혐의를 받고 있는지 설명해 주시겠소?

translation.en: I wish I was at liberty to say, sir.
Don't tell me it's a Clerkenwell.
What evidence do they have against my sister?
translation.ko: 내 여동생의 혐의에 대한 증거물이 뭡니까?

translation.en: Perhaps, uh, you tell me yours and I'll tell you mine.
translation.ko: 탐정님 사건을 알려주시면 저도 제 사건을 알려드리죠
- 왜죠? - 명령을 따를 뿐입니다, 홈즈 씨

translation.en: Or may I call you Sherlock?
My father thought it distinguished, and it is rather.
translation.ko: 아버지가 특별한 이름이라고 지어 주신 건데 사실 그렇죠

translation.en: [Lestrade] Well, anyway, should you ever wish to call me that…
My mistake. I should have warned you I was opening it.
translation.ko: 내가 깜빡했구나 열기 전에 주의를 줬어야 하는데

translation.en: "You tell me yours and I'll tell you mine."
translation.ko: '탐정님 사건을 알려주시면 저도 제 사건을 알려드리죠'

translation.en: He's a ninny. I needed to know what he had on you.
translation.ko: 그 멍청한 경찰 녀석이 너를 찾는 이유를 알아야 했어

translation.en: Money. Unaccounted transfers going in and out of government offices.
translation.ko: 돈 문제야, 국가 기관을 드나드는 미확인 송금이 있어

translation.en: My theory is either bribery, extortion, or blackmail.
translation.ko: 뇌물, 갈취, 아니면 협박이라는 게 현재 내 가설이야

translation.en: Separate filings from five different accounts
translation.ko: 다섯 개의 다른 계좌에서 각기 분리된 기록이

translation.en: going via the Treasury into one private bank.
translation.ko: 재무부를 통해 하나의 사설 은행으로 들어가

translation.en: -So someone is getting rich from this? -Yes.
I visited the bank and inquired. The money disappeared,
translation.ko: 직접 은행에 방문해 물어봤는데 사라진 돈은

translation.en: arriving at another bank, and then another,
translation.ko: 다른 은행으로 송금된 후에 거기서 또 다른 은행으로

translation.en: and another, and another, and another, and another.
translation.ko: 또 다른 은행, 다른 은행 다른 은행으로 계속 송금됐어

translation.en: Every one of them hidden using different account numbers.
translation.ko: 제각각 다른 계좌 번호를 사용해 정체를 숨겼는데

translation.en: -Well, what can you deduce from that? -Three things.
translation.ko: - 그걸로 추론할 수 있는 게 뭔데? - 세 가지야

translation.en: Firstly, the man's a game player, perhaps a genius in mathematics,
translation.ko: 첫째, 이 남자는 게임을 좋아해 매번 자기 흔적을

translation.en: capable of covering his traces at every turn.
translation.ko: 감쪽같이 지우는 걸 보면 수학 천재일지도 몰라

translation.en: Five banks, south of the river, but no clear link between them.
translation.ko: 강 남부에 있는 5개 은행 사이에 아무런 연관이 없어
모든 돈이 한 곳으로만 흘러들어 가

translation.en: Every time I pull a thread, it loosens, vanishes,
translation.ko: 엉성한 실마리를 잡아당길 때마다 실이 풀리거나, 사라지거나

translation.en: reappears somewhere else. He's leading me a merry dance.
translation.ko: 엉뚱한 데서 나타나는데 딱 애먹이는 댄스 파트너 꼴이야

translation.en: One. A week before the first transfer, there was a break-in at the Treasury office
translation.ko: 하나 있지, 첫 번째 송금 전에 재무부에 침입한 절도범이 있는데

translation.en: by a man in a taper crown hat.

translation.ko: - 뭘 훔쳐 갔는데? - 문서라는 말만 하던데

translation.en: They won't talk about it. Sensitive information presumably.
translation.ko: - 뭘 훔쳐 갔는데? - 문서라는 말만 하던데 아마 민감한 정보겠지

translation.en: But how it connects to all of this has so far eluded me.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 이 모든 게 어떻게 연결되는 건지 아직은 모르겠어

translation.en: Your turn. I hope the blood's not yours.
translation.ko: 이제 네 차례야 그게 네 피가 아니길 바란다

translation.en: I'm looking for a girl, Sarah Chapman.
She worked at Lyons match factory by day, and the music hall at night.
translation.ko: 실종자는 낮에는 성냥 공장에서 밤에는 뮤직홀에서 일했어
내가 찾아간 곳이 그 애인 집이야

translation.en: And there I found her friend,
And who killed her? This poppy fellow?
translation.ko: 누가 죽인 거야? 이 양귀비 놈인가?

translation.en: Perhaps he kidnapped Sarah and her friend discovered it.
translation.ko: 그 남자가 세라를 납치했는데 친구가 찾아낸 걸 수도 있어

translation.en: [scoffs] Love. What it does to people.
translation.ko: 사랑이란 게 사람을 참 이상하게 만들지

translation.en: I found more evidence on her.
It's as bad as the poem.
Grail said she had stolen something and that she was blackmailing them.
translation.ko: 그레일은 세라가 뭔가를 훔쳤고 사람들을 협박했다고 하던데

translation.en: -Though Sarah wouldn't do that. -You don't know this person.
translation.ko: - 세라는 그랬을 리 없어 - 어떻게 장담해? 모르는 여자잖아

translation.en: You came here running from the police.
translation.ko: 넌 경찰을 피해서 여기로 도망 왔어

translation.en: and you are now a suspect in a murder case.
translation.ko: 지금 넌 그 살인 사건 용의자야

translation.en: You've let your emotions get the better of you.
translation.ko: 감정에 치우쳐서 잘못된 처신을 한 거지

translation.en: Stay here. Don't leave. I will look into this.
translation.ko: 여기 있어, 나가지 마 내가 조사해 볼 테니까

translation.en: But Sarah Chapman is my responsibility. No one else cares for these girls.
translation.ko: 하지만 세라 채프먼은 내가 책임져야 해 아무도 그 애들을 돌봐주지 않아

translation.en: The first mistake a detective makes
is to make it about themselves and not the case.
translation.ko: 사건의 해결보다 자기 자신을 우선시하는 거야

translation.en: Enola, I know you're not a fan of unnecessary advice,
translation.ko: 에놀라, 네가 불필요한 충고를 싫어하는 건 알지만

translation.en: I should probably write that down.
[girl] Matches, matches! Come buy your matches!
Matches, matches! Only a penny a box.
[Mae] Posh girls like you don't belong in this fight.
translation.ko: 너 같은 상류층 아가씨는 이런 싸움이랑 안 어울려

translation.en: We don't need help from people like you.
translation.ko: 당신 같은 사람의 도움은 필요 없어요

translation.en: [man] See, they all think there's hope. That love is coming their way.
translation.ko: 그런 여자들은 희망을 품지 자기에게 사랑이 찾아올 거라고

translation.en: Gents like that, they want cheap,
[Enola] So, Poppy, you're a gent, are you?
translation.ko: 그러니까 양귀비 씨 당신은 신사인 거죠?

translation.en: And a well-heeled one to afford a love nest like that.
translation.ko: 그런 사랑의 아지트까지 있으니 돈도 많으실 테고

translation.en: [Sherlock] There was a break-in at the Treasury office
translation.ko: 첫 번째 송금 전에 재무부에 침입한 절도범이 있는데

translation.en: by a man in a taper crown hat.
Five banks, south of the river, but no clear link between them.
translation.ko: 강 남부에 있는 5개 은행 사이에 아무런 연관이 없어

translation.en: "Hosted by Henry and Hilda Lyon. 12 Marchmont Square."
Does that date mean anything to you?
It's not a date at all.
"Their eldest son, William Lyon, will be leading the first…"
Sweet Williams, for their wonderfully vivid reds.
Our ladies are working at the highest level of production and efficiency.
translation.ko: 보시다시피 직원들은 최고 수준의 생산성과 효율성을 갖췄습니다

translation.en: And all along, I thought you were a poppy.
Let's see how sweet you are, Sweet William.
translation.ko: 얼마나 다정한 신사인지 한번 봅시다, 스위트 윌리엄 씨

translation.en: Which, when you're wanted by the police, is most useful.
[man] Pray silence for his Lordship Viscount McIntyre.
I-I'm sorry to break apart this glorious occasion,
translation.ko: 저 때문에 이렇게 즐거운 파티를 잠시 쉬어가게 돼 죄송합니다

translation.en: Any chance to stand on a stage, I'll always take it.
translation.ko: 무대에 설 기회가 있으면 항상 냉큼 나서죠

translation.en: [Charles McIntyre] And I must speak to thank our host
translation.ko: 오늘 무도회를 개최하신 분께 감사를 보내고

translation.en: For Henry Lyon turns all before him into gold.
translation.ko: 헨리 라이언 씨는 눈앞의 모든 걸 금으로 만들었습니다

translation.en: What he has done with matches is legendary.
translation.ko: 이분이 성냥으로 이룬 업적은 가히 전설적입니다

translation.en: In two years, he's turned red into black.
Or should I say, red into white?
translation.ko: 정확하게는 적색을 백색으로 바꿨다고 해야 하나요?

translation.en: And to have this humble man turn his attention
translation.ko: 이제 이 겸손한 신사분께서 티푸스로 고통받는

translation.en: to typhoid and the working poor,
translation.ko: 이제 이 겸손한 신사분께서 티푸스로 고통받는 가난한 노동자들을 위해

translation.en: raising funds, diagnosing cases in the community,
translation.ko: 기금을 모금하며 지역 실태를 점검하려 합니다

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I give you Henry Lyon.
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분 헨리 라이언을 위해 건배합시다

translation.en: And to his fine son, his heir, William.
translation.ko: 또한 그의 훌륭한 아들이자 후계자인 윌리엄을 위하여

translation.en: -[all] To the future. -[McIntyre] May it ever be bright.
I believe I've seen that dress somewhere before.
translation.ko: 예전에 많이 본 드레스 같지 않아?

translation.en: This is a wonderful occasion, is it not?
I mean, the guests are just… delightful.
And the orchestra is most tuneful.
I might be able to speak to you, Mr. Lyon.
translation.ko: 라이언 씨와 이야기를 나눌 수 있을까요?

translation.en: -Uh, have I said something wrong? -Where is your chaperone?
translation.ko: 제가 무슨 말을 잘못했나요? 아가씨 샤프롱은 어디 있죠?

translation.en: My dear, you can hardly expect my son to talk to you unaccompanied.
translation.ko: 동석자 없이는 내 아들이 아가씨와 대화를 나눌 수 없소

translation.en: I cannot talk to you without a chaperone?
It could be claimed, with some justification,
translation.ko: 자기 합리화를 좀 보태서 준비가 미흡했을 뿐이라고

translation.en: that I might have prepared more thoroughly.
But dancing is not one of my core strengths.
translation.ko: 사실 춤은 제가 잘하는 종목이 아니에요

translation.en: ♪ Knees up Mother Brown Under the table you must go ♪
translation.ko: 춤춰요, 브라운 여사님 탁자 아래에서 신나게

translation.en: Separate filings from five different accounts.
translation.ko: 다섯 개의 다른 계좌에서 각기 분리된 기록이…

translation.en: Capable of covering his traces at every turn. One private bank.
translation.ko: 자기 흔적을 감쪽같이… 하나의 사설 은행으로…

translation.en: Vanishes and reappears. No name. Just a number.
translation.ko: 사라지거나 엉뚱한 데서… 이름은 몰라 단지 숫자로만 존재하지

translation.en: [Sherlock] Yes. The Language of the Dance.

translation.ko: 우리 전에 어디선가 만난 적 있죠?

translation.en: I feel I recognize you from somewhere.
[chuckles awkwardly] I simply have one of those faces.

translation.ko: 재무 장관을 맡고 계신 매킨타이어 경의

translation.en: You mustn't let them concern you.
Everyone here is playing a part.
What are they doing with those fans?
or too embarrassing to say aloud.
Without power, we women must rely on our wits for our fortune,
translation.ko: 권력이 없는 여자들은 기지를 발휘해야만 행운을 잡을 수 있죠

translation.en: because our chances are short. Here.
I have no use for it.
And if you wish to speak to William,
you could always try with that.
No, not… No, not you. Oh.
Really, there's no need to be rude.
translation.ko: 뭡니까, 그렇게 무례하게 굴 것까진 없잖아요!

translation.en: Don't speak to me here, otherwise you'll be thrown onto the street.
translation.ko: 나한테 말 걸지 마 밖으로 쫓겨나는 수가 있어

translation.en: -I need you to teach me to dance. -Teach you to dance? When?
translation.ko: - 춤 좀 가르쳐 줘 - 춤을 가르쳐 달라고? 언제?

translation.en: You understand I've been learning since I was five?
translation.ko: 내가 5살 때부터 춤 배운 거 알지?

translation.en: Good. I'd feared you'd be a terrible teacher.
translation.ko: 다행이네, 네가 춤 가르치는 데 재능 없을까 봐 걱정했거든

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -I'm looking for a murderer.
translation.ko: - 에놀라, 여기서 뭐 해? - 살인자를 찾고 있어

translation.en: Though I shouldn't have told you. Forget I told you that.
translation.ko: 말하면 안 되는 거였는데 못 들은 걸로 해

translation.en: -I'm trying to save a girl's life. -Through dance?
translation.ko: - 한 소녀의 생명을 구하는 일이야 - 춤추는 게?

translation.en: All right. Hold your back straight.
And I'll place my hand here and here.
Now, I will lead and you will follow.
-That seems like a mistake. -Face over my shoulder.
translation.ko: - 그러면 안 될 거 같은데 - 얼굴은 내 어깨 위로 기울여

translation.en: Four, two, three. One, two, three.
translation.ko: 넷, 둘, 셋 하나, 둘, 셋

translation.en: You seem different since last we spoke.
Tell me why you've been coming to the park.
translation.ko: 그 공원에 있었던 이유를 말해 봐

translation.en: Why… Why watch me walk to the Lords?
translation.ko: 왜 내가 상원에 가는 모습을 보는 거야?

translation.en: Simply keeping an eye on you,
in case you get yourself into any more scrapes.
translation.ko: 네가 또 위험에 빠질까 봐 걱정돼서

translation.en: You cannot be trusted to take care of yourself.
translation.ko: 넌 너 자신을 지키는 일은 잘하지 못하잖아

translation.en: You're a man when I tell you you're a man.
And the scrapes I find myself in are far less visceral.
translation.ko: 그리고 난 누구에 비하면 위험한 축에도 못 껴

translation.en: Dancing is a trust, it's a union. That's why I've always loved it,
translation.ko: 춤은 신뢰를 바탕으로 한 협업이야 그래서 난 늘 춤추는 걸 좋아했어

translation.en: even when I was being tutored by my uncle.
translation.ko: 내 춤 선생은 우리 삼촌이었는데도 말이야

translation.en: That man likes a pork mustard pie.
-You dance well. -Perhaps I have a fine teacher.
translation.ko: - 춤 잘 추네 - 훌륭한 선생님 덕분인가?

translation.en: Though his breath has less mustard on it than I'd hoped. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 생각보다 겨자 냄새가 덜 나는 선생님이긴 하지만

translation.en: -[woman] We have an urgent situation. -[knocking continues]
Don't touch the ginger cake. Plays hopscotch with your bowels.
translation.ko: 생강케이크 먹지 마요 위장에서 아주 요동을 치네!

translation.en: I was wondering if we might have a dance this evening.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 함께 춤출 수 있을까요?

translation.en: Your last waltz is still free.
I hear he's a good man, and a great reformer.
translation.ko: 저분은 성품도 좋으시고 훌륭한 개혁가라고 들었어요

translation.en: Well, if you wish to dance with him, you may have to wait.
Yes, I mustn't lose my chance.
Forgive me for interrupting. My name is Cicely.
translation.ko: 말씀 중에 죄송합니다 저는 시슬리라고 해요

translation.en: Um, your friend Tabitha suggested we might dance.
translation.ko: 친구분 되시는 타비사 양이 같이 춤추는 걸 권해서요

translation.en: [man] Ladies and gentlemen, please take your partners for the last waltz.
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분 각자 파트너와 함께 마지막 왈츠를 준비해 주세요

translation.en: You know, I swear I know your face.
translation.ko: 전에 뵌 적이 있는 거 같아요

translation.en: but I've seen you looking. Why?
[Enola] Of course. The Paragon Music Hall.
I saw you talking with a young woman there.
translation.ko: 거기서 젊은 여자분이랑 이야기하시는 걸 봤어요

translation.en: Dislocate from me and I will scream.
The police are onto you, Mr. Lyon. As it happens, they are onto us both.
translation.ko: 경찰이 라이언 씨를 노리고 있어요 공교롭게도 우리 둘 다 노리고 있죠

translation.en: You were not invited here. What do you want?
translation.ko: 여기에 초대받지 않았을 텐데 대체 원하는 게 뭡니까?

translation.en: [Enola] I'm a private detective, hired by Sarah's sister to find her.
translation.ko: 저는 세라의 여동생한테 사건을 의뢰받은 사설탐정이에요
안 그러면 모든 게 수포가 돼요

translation.en: If you must persist with this, meet me in the library at midnight.
translation.ko: 더 할 이야기가 있으면 자정에 서재에서 만나요

translation.en: -My word, you do get in awkward places. -Why are you holding a poker?
translation.ko: 뜬금없이 나타나는 재주가 있구나? 부지깽이는 왜 들고 있어?

translation.en: You must leave. I'm waiting for another.
Another you're scared of such that you need a weapon?
translation.ko: 무기까지 들고 있어야 할 만큼 무서운 사람?

translation.en: You are always here when I don't want you to be.
translation.ko: 넌 꼭 안 좋은 타이밍에 내 앞에 나타나더라!

translation.en: And sometimes here when you do.
-What's the matter with you? -Nothing that need concern you.
translation.ko: - 넌 대체 왜 그래? - 네가 걱정할 일 아니야

translation.en: I like the look of the one you were dancing with. What's her name, Cicely?
translation.ko: 너랑 같이 춤춘 여자 예쁘더라 이름이 시슬리라던가?

translation.en: She would make you an excellent wife.
Enola, I am concerned only for you.
Tewkesbury, if you're still here, you may scare him away.
translation.ko: 튜크스베리, 네가 여기 있으면 그 남자가 놀라 도망칠 거야

translation.en: -"Scare him"? All of this is over a man? -[sighs]
translation.ko: 뭐? '그 남자'? 이게 다 남자 때문이야?

translation.en: Try to escape, and we will make this difficult.
translation.ko: 도망을 시도하면 아주 곤란하게 될 겁니다

translation.en: Let's make it quiet and spare the fine people any embarrassment.
translation.ko: 그러니 손님들께 피해 되지 않도록 조용히 따라오시죠

translation.en: -Sir, whatever this is about, I'm sure-- -Murder, sir.
-[woman] Oh, I say. -I knew she didn't belong here.
You danced with young Master Lyon, I hear.
translation.ko: 젊은 후계자 라이언 씨와 함께 춤췄다고 들었소

translation.en: May I ask, impertinently, I'm sure,
did you want to kiss him,
or find out more about your case,
translation.ko: 아니면 사건에 대한 정보를 캐내려던 거요?

translation.en: Look, if you're trying to protect her,
translation.ko: 이봐요, 그 여자를 지키고 싶은 거라면

translation.en: There's someone wants to talk to her,
translation.ko: 그 여자를 만나고 싶어 하는 누군가가 있는데

translation.en: and they're not as kind as me.
Why were you following me that night?
You were following Mae too, weren't you?
That's why you found the flat.

translation.ko: 누구한테 뒷돈을 받는 겁니까 그레일 경감님?

translation.en: Who's paying you to kill match girls?
translation.ko: 누구한테 돈을 받고 성냥 공장 노동자들을 죽인 거죠?

translation.en: -I don't know. -She's a thief and a troublemaker.
You don't want to risk your skin for her.
translation.ko: 그 여자 때문에 아가씨 목숨을 내놓을 건 아니잖아!

translation.en: Well, if I can't find it out from you, I'll find it out from someone else,
translation.ko: 아가씨가 말하지 않으면 다른 사람에게서 들어야겠지

translation.en: Oh, but that's how it starts, Enola Holmes!
translation.ko: 원래 그렇게 시작되는 거야 에놀라 홈즈!

translation.en: With little girls like her, and you, and Sarah Chapman,
translation.ko: 걔처럼 어린 여자애나 아가씨나 세라 채프먼 같은 이들이

translation.en: asking questions, doubting those in charge,
not seeing their protection for what it is,
Well, it only takes one little flame to start a fire,
translation.ko: 고작 작은 불씨 하나에 큰불이 일어나는 거야

translation.en: and my job is to keep crushing those bloody flames out.
translation.ko: 그런 빌어먹을 불씨를 없애는 게 내가 할 일이고!

translation.en: Now, I'll be kind and give you one last chance.
translation.ko: 마지막으로 한 번 더 기회를 주도록 하지

translation.en: If you can arrange her release,
She is my ward and a minor.
Any evidence you think you have against her--
translation.ko: 그 애의 혐의를 입증할 증거가 있으시다면…

translation.en: She was seen arguing with the victim, following the victim,
translation.ko: 피해자와 말다툼하는 걸 본 목격자도 있고 피해자를 미행했고

translation.en: fighting with the victim, and lastly, standing over the victim's dead body.
translation.ko: 피해자와 몸싸움을 벌였으며 피해자의 사체 옆에 있었죠

translation.en: And when we find her there, with blood on her hands,
translation.ko: 게다가 경찰이 당도했을 땐 두 손이 피투성이였는데

translation.en: Marks on and around the door show that it was forced open,
translation.ko: 문 주변의 흔적을 보니 그 문은 강제로 열렸더군요

translation.en: There were signs of a scuffle
and boot marks from three separate intruders.
translation.ko: 신발 자국은 세 명의 침입자를 암시했습니다

translation.en: judging by the height and extent of the subsequent damage.
translation.ko: 손상 정도를 확인한 결과 높이와 규모로 짐작한 겁니다

translation.en: Traces of fabric and spots of blood
suggests that there was another occupant, likely female,
translation.ko: 그곳엔 여성으로 추정되는 또 다른 인물이 있었습니다

translation.en: who seems to have fought back,
using a sharp and improvised weapon…
This was a targeted search and interrogation
translation.ko: 두 명의 여자를 상대로 표적 수색과

translation.en: in which two women were discovered,
and you were curiously fast to arrive after her.
translation.ko: 그런데 경감님은 이상하게도 그 직후에 도착하셨고요

translation.en: Now, are you going to release her, or shall I?
translation.ko: 이제 제 동생을 풀어 주시죠 아니면 제가…

translation.en: Makes our work so much more efficient,
translation.ko: 덕분에 우리 업무 효율성이 대단히 높아질 거요

translation.en: My sister never touched that weapon.
translation.ko: 내 동생은 살해 도구를 만진 적이 없습니다

translation.en: Then why are her prints on it?
It's a great age we live in, isn't it, Mr. Holmes?
translation.ko: 우리가 참 대단한 시대에 살고 있어요, 아닌가요?

translation.en: [woman] Have you any sense what time it is?
-Hello, Edith. -You're lucky, I almost broke your legs.
translation.ko: - 안녕하세요, 이디스 - 운도 좋으셔라 다리를 분지를 뻔했어요

translation.en: -You have very recognizable shoulders. -Enola's been arrested.
translation.ko: - 아주 눈에 띄는 어깨예요 - 에놀라가 체포됐어요

translation.en: it may go wider than I thought.
And there's something about this case that…
[Edith] Well, like my mother always said,
"Those who can turn to others when they're in need
translation.ko: 도움이 필요한 순간에 주변인들에게 의지하는 이가

translation.en: are the truly brave amongst us."
Your mother sounds very different to mine.
translation.ko: 이디스 어머님은 우리 어머님과 굉장히 다른 분이군요

translation.en: I did try to stop her,
but she's full of this fight.
And I fear she will hang.
Oh, it is good to see you.
So this case of yours, how's it going?
translation.ko: 그나저나 수사 중인 사건은 어떻게 되고 있니?

translation.en: I was trying to help a girl find her sister, and I've made things worse.
translation.ko: 모르겠어요 실종된 언니를 찾아주려다가 - 상황이 더 악화됐어요 - 무슨 소리

translation.en: You stirred up a hornet's nest. You are onto something.
translation.ko: 네가 위험인물을 건드린 거야 곧 뭔가 발견하게 생긴 거지

translation.en: -Standby! -Why else would they try and silence you?
translation.ko: - 준비해! - 그게 아니라면 왜 널 가뒀겠어?

translation.en: -[Edith] On your left! -My left or yours?
This match factory, what do you know about it?
translation.ko: 그 성냥 공장에 대해서는 어떤 정보가 있지?

translation.en: In two years, it's doubled its profits.
Yes, the girls are going down with it. They're dying.
translation.ko: 네, 여성 노동자들이 그거 때문에 죽어 가요

translation.en: Girls like Sarah Chapman, they're expendable.
translation.ko: 세라 채프먼 같은 애들은 소모품 같은 거야

translation.en: They go missing, too often they die, no one cares.
translation.ko: 사라지기도 하고 죽기도 하지만 아무도 신경 쓰지 않아

translation.en: But this girl, they care about. And greatly.
translation.ko: 하지만 이번 실종자는 달라 굉장히 신경 쓰고 있잖아

translation.en: Aha! So what's she gonna do with them? What's her plan? She's not a thief.
translation.ko: 걔가 그걸로 뭘 할까? 계획이 뭘까? 걘 도둑도 아니고 협박범도 아니야

translation.en: She's not a blackmailer. She is a troublemaker.
translation.ko: 걘 도둑도 아니고 협박범도 아니야 골칫거리인 거야

translation.en: and that is infinitely more dangerous.
-Stand by to the right! -Would you mind?
[policeman] Get it out! Get it out of here!
Now, whatever Sarah's hiding, Enola, it's a secret.
translation.ko: 세라가 숨기고 있는 게 뭐든 간에 그건 비밀인 게 틀림없어

translation.en: You need to look for what she knows, Enola.
translation.ko: 그 애가 아는 게 뭔지 알아내야 해, 에놀라

translation.en: Find that out, and everything else will follow.
translation.ko: 그걸 알아내면 다른 건 다 술술 풀릴 거야

translation.en: You all right? You all right?
[Eudoria groans] Good thing I never valued my pelvis.
translation.ko: 내가 골반을 소중히 여기지 않아서 다행이지

translation.en: Hm. You enjoy everything. It's most irritating.
translation.ko: 넌 모든 걸 다 즐기잖아 정말 짜증 나

translation.en: [Edith] Come on, this way. Better get a move on.
So, um, how's that useless boy of yours?
translation.ko: 그나저나 그 쓸모없다는 네 남자애 녀석은 어때?

translation.en: I hear he's doing good work.
Well then, perhaps not so useless after all.
You know, I sometimes think I brought you up to be too independent.
translation.ko: 가끔은 내가 널 너무 독립적으로 키운 거 같다는 생각이 들어

translation.en: -Mother! -[Eudoria] I did it with all of you.
translation.ko: - 엄마 - 자식 셋을 다 그렇게 길렀지

translation.en: Your purpose must be to find who you are.
translation.ko: 진정한 너 자신을 발견하는 걸 목표로 삼아야 한다
강인하고 뚝심 있고 독립적인 아이들로 자랐지만

translation.en: but, well, perhaps a little lonely.
You will do very well on your own, Enola.
But with others, you could be magnificent.
translation.ko: 하지만 힘을 합치면 끝내주게 잘해낼 수 있어

translation.en: Who do you think organized all of this after all? Hm?
translation.ko: 결국 이 모든 걸 누가 다 준비했겠니?

translation.en: Work with them, and you will become more of who you are.
translation.ko: 동지와 함께하면 네 몫을 더 잘해낼 수 있어

translation.en: and you will make more noise than you could ever have imagined.
translation.ko: 우리는 상상을 초월하는 엄청난 소음을 낼 수 있거든

translation.en: Come on. She should go. We'll put them off her scent.
translation.ko: 자, 이제 에놀라는 보내고 우리가 놈들을 유인하자

translation.en: And if you ever get condemned for murder again, you give me a shout.
I think my hair is fine.
[Enola] I need you to pack your things.
I need you to be in a safer place.
I'm sure she's all right. I'm closer to finding her.
translation.ko: 세라는 분명히 무사해 곧 찾을 거야

translation.en: She's got a spare bed now.
There's traces of something in this soil.
One has red, and one has white in it.
The matches you make, when did they change from red to white?
translation.ko: 너희 공장 성냥이 빨간색에서 흰색으로 바뀐 게 언제야?

translation.en: I dunno. Around two years ago.
In two years, he's turned red into black. Or should I say red into white?
translation.ko: 2년 만에 재정 적자를 흑자로 바꾸었죠 정확하게는 적색을 백색으로 바꿨다고 해야 하나요?

translation.en: [Mr. Lyon] Typhus. The plague of our times.
Two years it's been killing these girls.
translation.ko: 2년 동안 수많은 여성 노동자들의 목숨을 앗아갔어요

translation.en: Don't make me repeat it! May I come in?
translation.ko: 같은 말 또 하게 하지 마 들어가도 되지?

translation.en: Firstly, I would like to apologize for so much.
translation.ko: 우선 사과부터 할게 정말 너무 미안해

translation.en: I have failed to see allies in plain sight.
translation.ko: 내가 아군에 대해 편견을 가지고 있었어

translation.en: There's something I wish to say too.
All day, every day, all I do is compromise.
translation.ko: 매일 온종일 타협하는 게 내 일이야

translation.en: If I vote for this lord's bill that will allow him to pump bilge water into a lake,
translation.ko: 선저 폐수를 호수에 방출하는 법안에 동의해야만

translation.en: then he will vote for my forestry reform.
translation.ko: 상대방도 내 삼림 개혁안에 찬성표를 주기 때문이지

translation.en: I want to stand up and say, "This isn't right," but I have no allies.
translation.ko: 나야 물론 그건 옳지 않다고 맞서고 싶어 하지만 내겐 아군이 없어

translation.en: So to do so would be to risk all that is good,
translation.ko: 함부로 목소리를 냈다가는 좋은 것들까지 망칠 위험이 커서

translation.en: so I lie awake trying to work out which path to follow,
translation.ko: 난 잠도 못 이루고 내가 가야 할 길에 대해 고민해

translation.en: There is no search for a wife,
That is the speech I stored up for you.
But I understand your struggle, because I struggle too.
translation.ko: 하지만 네 고충은 이해돼 나 역시 마찬가지니까

translation.en: I am sorry we cannot talk more, because I have--
translation.ko: 더 많은 이야기를 나누고 싶지만 내가 지금…

translation.en: The girl I'm looking for, Sarah Chapman,
she has proof that girls are dying
from the phosphorus they work with every day.
translation.ko: 여성 노동자들을 죽게 한다는 증거를 가진 사람이야

translation.en: And the factory are trying to cover it up as typhus.
translation.ko: 해당 공장은 티푸스를 핑계로 그 사실을 은폐하고 있어

translation.en: and someone is going to kill her for it.
-Don't open it. it could be the police. -You're still wanted by the police?
translation.ko: - 문 열지 마, 경찰일지도 몰라 - 경찰? - 아직도 수배 중이야? - 당연하지, 나 탈옥했어
- 아직도 수배 중이야? - 당연하지, 나 탈옥했어 - 탈옥했다고? - 못 들은 걸로 해

translation.en: The lights are on. If I don't answer, they'll suspect more. Hide.
translation.ko: 불이 켜져 있는데 대답 안 하면 더 의심받아, 숨어

translation.en: -Miss Cicely. -[Cicely] I'm sorry it's so late.
No, no, not at all. I-I told you to come. I-I want to help.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 전혀 아닙니다 제가 돕고 싶어서 오시라고 했는걸요, 근데…

translation.en: Better we are alone, for it is imperative that I speak with you.
translation.ko: 잘됐네요, 둘이서만 이야기하죠 꼭 드려야 할 말씀이 있거든요

translation.en: Sir, I feel that you're a man of great character
and that I can trust you.
Which is why I fear I may have to unburden myself, and it may prove shocking.
translation.ko: 그래서 제 비밀을 털어놓고 싶은데 충격적인 얘기라 염려가 돼요

translation.en: It's just, I've been wanting to speak with you about… a relationship.
Oh, that. Yes. Uh, perhaps we can discuss this another time?
translation.ko: 그렇군요… 지금은 좀 곤란한데 다음에 뵙죠

translation.en: I'm terribly sorry. Let me assure you, I do share your interest.
translation.ko: - 부탁드려요, 자작님 - 정말 죄송합니다 하지만 저도 확실히 그 문제에 관심이 있으니

translation.en: Do not think of doubting me. Cicely was here for my help.
translation.ko: 나 의심하지 마, 시슬리는 나한테 도움을 청하러 온 거야

translation.en: She told me at the ball that she's working on a bill to change factory law.
translation.ko: 지난번 무도회장에서 나한테 공장 관련 법안을 바꾸고 싶다고 하더라

translation.en: She's unearthed something, some corruption or other.
translation.ko: 뭔가를 알아냈다면서 무슨 비리 의혹을 제기했어

translation.en: Enola, if you have any concerns, I tell you categorically, I…
translation.ko: 에놀라, 혹시 걱정하는 거면 내가 장담하는데…

translation.en: I have no eyes for anyone, but…
Well, no, this is not quite how I wanted to say that.
But to say, in terms of romantic interests,
The reason I don't have to search, I'm busy with politics, like I said…
translation.ko: 내가 신붓감을 물색하지 않는 건 정치하느라 너무 바빠서…

translation.en: I hear he is a good man and a great reformer.
translation.ko: 저분은 성품도 좋으시고 훌륭한 개혁가라고 들었어요

translation.en: The woman I would be most interested in--
You got five seconds to tell me why you're here.
translation.ko: 5초 줄 테니까 여기 온 이유를 말해

translation.en: The phosphorus in the match-making has mixed with oxygen.
translation.ko: 성냥 만드는 데 쓰는 인이 산소를 만나 그렇게 변한 거지

translation.en: Enola, did you understand what I said?
Or rather what I didn't say? Did you understand… what I didn't say?
translation.ko: 돌려 말하긴 했지만 무슨 말을 하려는 건지… 알아들었어?

translation.en: Yes. You were saying that you…
That message you sent me with the fan at the ball,
translation.ko: 무도회 때 네가 나한테 부채로 보낸 메시지 있었잖아

translation.en: [McIntyre] Ladies and gentlemen, to the future.
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분 미래를 위해 건배합시다

translation.en: They were working together, in love.
translation.ko: 이건 연인 관계인 그 둘이 함께 벌인 일이야

translation.en: To expose the corruption in that factory and stop what his father was doing.
translation.ko: 공장의 비리를 폭로하고 자기 아버지를 저지하려 했던 거야

translation.en: William Lyon invited you to that ball.
translation.ko: 그래서 윌리엄 라이언이 너를 그 무도회에 초대한 거야

translation.en: He's a radical just like you.
They needed my help. You're right.
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞아 내 도움이 필요하댔어

translation.en: But, Enola, we must return inside.
The police are pursuing you, and we have much to talk of.
translation.ko: 경찰이 널 쫓고 있고 우린 할 얘기가 많으니까…

translation.en: No! I know we have much to talk of, my dear, dear lord.
translation.ko: 아니, 할 얘기 많은 건 나도 알아 이 귀족 의원님아

translation.en: And as it turns out, I love you too.
-[Enola] Shh. You're walking loudly. -[Tewkesbury] But it's gravel.
-[Enola] You've got large feet. -[Tewkesbury] I know.
translation.ko: - 무슨 발이 그렇게 커? - 나도 알아!

translation.en: If anyone comes, just tell them you're a lord.
I told you to stay safe and stay away.
translation.ko: 내가 안전하게 멀리 떨어져 있으라고 했잖아

translation.en: Now you're breaking out of prison and have the police after you.
translation.ko: 이제 탈옥까지 하는 바람에 경찰이 널 잡으려고 혈안이 됐어

translation.en: Oh. Are you hurt? I am sorry.
I wonder who taught you to fight like that.
translation.ko: 그런 싸움 기술은 누구한테 배운 건지 궁금하구나

translation.en: Another thing our mother has to answer for.
She should have fed me as well as you is what I think.
translation.ko: 엄마가 오빠만큼 나를 더 잘 먹였으면 좋았을 텐데

translation.en: Hang on. Why are you here? Is it my case, or your own?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 오빠가 왜 여기 있어? 이거 내 사건이야, 오빠 사건이야?

translation.en: Both. I know how Grail got your fingerprints.
translation.ko: 둘 다야, 그레일이 네 지문을 어떻게 채취했는지 알아냈어
탁자에 묻어 있던 산화된 인의 먼지를 떼어서

translation.en: lifted from the table and applied to the knife.

translation.ko: 증명되지 않은 한 확실한 건 없지

translation.en: It seems our cases are connected.
translation.ko: 우리 사건이 서로 연관된 거 같구나

translation.en: And my thief in a taper crown hat.
Stay unemotional. There's nothing more we can do for him now.
translation.ko: 감정은 자제해, 지금 우리가 이 남자를 살릴 길은 없어

translation.en: Need to keep our minds fresh and our eyes sharp.
-[Sherlock] Yes, and searched. -[Enola] For the document he took?
translation.ko: - 맞아, 수색도 당했군 - 훔쳐 간 문서 때문이겠지

translation.en: and scratch marks from a cane that has a metal ferrule.
translation.ko: 끝부분이 철제로 마감된 지팡이로 긁힌 흔적도 있어

translation.en: There was another in this room.
[Mr. Lyon] Well, Lord McIntyre, if I, um, might suggest a little lunch.
translation.ko: 자, 매킨타이어 경 저희와 점심이라도 같이 드시죠

translation.en: [William] Leave me be, please. They're watching.
translation.ko: 제발 나를 내버려 둬요 우리를 지켜보고 있어요

translation.en: The office of Lord McIntyre, Treasury Minister.
translation.ko: 그럼 재무 장관 매킨타이어 경의 집무실이었겠네

translation.en: How did you come to that?
I think what William stole was proof
that Lyon and McIntyre were conspiring together.
McIntyre has been secretly profiting from the factory.
translation.ko: 매킨타이어는 그 공장에서 비밀리에 부당 이익을 취한 거야

translation.en: They changed the match formula to a cheaper phosphorus,
Enola, I was concerned for you.
You left me out there in the dark, and I nearly tore my…
translation.ko: 어두운 데 나 혼자 남겨 두고 돌아오질 않으니…
- 셜록 홈즈? 반갑… - 그럴 때가 아니야
아니야 - 하지만 다 들어맞잖아 - 이 의자엔 아무도 앉지 않았어

translation.en: No one has sat in this chair. No marks on the carpet, no indentation.
translation.ko: - 하지만 다 들어맞잖아 - 이 의자엔 아무도 앉지 않았어 카펫에 자국도 없고 움푹 들어간 곳도 없어

translation.en: The cigar has been smoked, but cold.
translation.ko: 이 시가는 피웠던 흔적은 있지만 차가워

translation.en: -No lips have touched that glass. -[Sherlock] Exactly.
These clues have been planted for us to find,
translation.ko: 이 단서들은 진짜 범인을 찾을 수 없게

translation.en: to mislead us from the true villain.
Not McIntyre, but by someone who had a lot to lose without that document.
translation.ko: 매킨타이어는 아니지만 그 문건을 빼앗기면 잃을 게 많은 사람이겠지

translation.en: Someone who knew what they were up to and was blackmailing them.
translation.ko: 그들의 꿍꿍이를 알기 때문에 그걸로 협박할 수 있었던 사람

translation.en: -Did they get what they wanted? -[Sherlock] No, I don't think so.
translation.ko: - 원하는 걸 가져갔을까요? - 아니, 아닐 거야

translation.en: -[Enola] They did get something. -[Sherlock] Mae's terrible music.
translation.ko: - 놈들이 가져간 게 있긴 하네 - 메이의 그 형편없는 악보로군

translation.en: The Gods is the top row of the theater.
translation.ko: 극장에서 가장 높은 층을 '신들의 객석'이라고 부르잖아요

translation.en: Just to be clear as to what we might be about to face…
translation.ko: 우리에게 닥칠 일이 어떤 건지 설명해 줄래?

translation.en: There may be some violence. You've faced it before.
I did have part of a suit of armor on.
-You've been in a fight before? -Yes, plenty of fights.
translation.ko: - 싸움해 본 적이 있기는 하지? - 그럼, 엄청 많지

translation.en: Fine. Can you teach me to fight?
What, right now? In a carriage?
Did I not teach you to dance in five minutes in a bathroom?
translation.ko: 난 화장실에서 5분 만에 춤추는 법을 가르쳐 줬잖아

translation.en: There are two secrets to fighting. Avoid the punch, make the counterpunch.
translation.ko: 싸움에는 두 가지 비결이 있어 주먹을 피하고 반격을 가하는 거야

translation.en: I don't see how two secrets-- Ow!
Your second. You didn't avoid the punch.
translation.ko: 두 번째, 넌 내 주먹을 피하지 않아서 반격당한 거야

translation.en: -You can hardly expect me to hit a girl. -Oh dear.
translation.ko: - 내가 여자를 때릴 순 없잖아 - 뭐래?

translation.en: I may need more of those lessons.
[Enola] The contract between Lyon and McIntyre
translation.ko: 인의 교체 건에 대해서 라이언과 매킨타이어

translation.en: And the pages from the factory register.
That's what you stole from the office.
These are the names of the girls they killed.
And it's proof that match girls are dying from working in that factory,
translation.ko: 이건 성냥 공장 여성 노동자들의 죽음에 대한 증거물이자

translation.en: and they knew it all along.
You're a bloody good detective, Enola Holmes.
translation.ko: 에놀라 홈즈 아가씨는 정말 뛰어난 탐정이시네요

translation.en: I will share this with the world, I promise you.
Now we must find William. He was supposed to meet me six hours ago.
translation.ko: 이제 윌리엄을 찾아야겠어요 6시간 전에 여기로 오기로 했는데

translation.en: I'm afraid William won't be coming.
translation.ko: 유감입니다만 윌리엄은 올 수 없게 됐습니다

translation.en: I told him we had everything we needed.
translation.ko: 제가 그 사람에게 필요한 증거를 다 모았으니

translation.en: That we should just go public.
He said nobody would care unless we had someone in power who would listen.
translation.ko: 그이는 우리 쪽에 권력가가 없으면 소용없는 일이라고 했죠

translation.en: He was just trying to keep me safe.
We must move quickly, or we'll lose you too.
translation.ko: 서둘러 움직이지 않으면 우리는 세라마저 잃게 돼요

translation.en: Give me the papers and I will.
-[Sherlock] Don't just stand there! -[tense music continues]
Avoid the punch, make the counterpunch.
-[Enola gasps] -[Mae] You got more to you than I thought.
What places we find ourselves in.
I used to dream I'd end up on the stage. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 한때 무대에 서는 게 내 꿈이었던 시절도 있지

translation.en: You're not rid of me yet,
translation.ko: 너 아직 나 못 떼어 냈어

translation.en: [Enola] Lord McIntyre. What are you doing here?
Your brother knew that I would want to see the right people shown justice.
translation.ko: 아가씨의 오빠가 나를 이렇게 정의가 실현되는 현장에 불렀죠

translation.en: And I don't know how to thank you for retrieving this government property
translation.ko: 내가 얼마나 감사한지 모를 거요 정부 재산을 되찾아 주고

translation.en: and, uh, bringing this killer to light.

translation.ko: 우리 중에 저렇게 썩어 빠진 놈이 있었다니

translation.en: The world shall know the name Enola Holmes,
translation.ko: 아가씨는 만천하에 이름을 떨치게 될 거요, 에놀라 홈즈

translation.en: -Theft. -All she stole from you was the truth.
which she used for extortion and blackmail.
Which is why she will serve her time.
I summoned you here to draw that very person out.
translation.ko: 바로 그 협박범의 정체를 밝히고자 경을 이곳으로 오시라 했습니다

translation.en: A tangle of roots, but all pointed to one pocket.
translation.ko: 뿌리가 얼기설기한데도 오직 한 주머니로 향했죠

translation.en: One person receiving the fruits of their schemes
translation.ko: 아무도 모르게 이러한 책략의 최대 수혜자가 될 수 있는 인물이
모든 걸 듣고, 모든 걸 보면서도

translation.en: And it's fun, once you know the rules.
[Miss Troy] It's remarkable what can be done

translation.ko: 남을 무시하면 이런 큰일을 당할 수 있다니

translation.en: He threatened to cut off your money train.
You hired Grail to retrieve the document,
translation.ko: 그래서 그레일에게 시켜 문서를 되찾아 오게 했어요

translation.en: but things got out of hand,
translation.ko: 하지만 상황이 걷잡을 수 없게 돼 버렸고

translation.en: so you tried to point us to Lord McIntyre.
A rare misstep in your game…
Such a shame our divertissement has to end, Mr. Holmes.
